wikitext.*:
'''Sauron''' is an American blackened thrash metal band formed in 2000 at East Lansing, Michigan. It is one of many bands with the [[Sauron (band)|same name]].

The lyrics of the song ''Witch King'', from their [[2004]] album ''Trash Assault'', heavily reference the [[Witch-king|eponymous character]].<ref>{{Cite web|articleurl=https://www.metal-archives.com/albums/Sauron/Thrash_Assault/42268|articlename=Thrash Assault|website=[https://www.metal-archives.com Encyclopaedia Metallum ]}}</ref>
